summary: Quincy Adams Wagstaff, the new president of Huxley University, accidentally hires bumblers Baravelli and Pinky to help his school win the big football game against the rival Darwin University.
cast: The Marx Brothers|Groucho Marx|Harpo Marx|Chico Marx|Zeppo Marx|Thelma Todd|David Landau|Bobby Barber|Reginald Barlow|Vince Barnett|Sheila Bromley|E.H. Calvert|Edgar Dearing|Robert Greig|Theresa Harris|Edward LeSaint|Florine McKinney|Nat Pendleton|Lee Phelps|James Pierce|Frank Rice|Syd Saylor|Arthur Sheekman|Ben Taggart|Phil Tead
keywords: slot machine|femme fatale|professor|college|breaking the fourth wall
director: Director: Norman Z. McLeod (as Norman McLeod)
title: Plumas de caballo
